column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////The rest of the team went H.A.M on the deep dish. The classic
column2: the mushroom and the cheese were all ordered and devoured with pleasure. But
column3: we are getting ahead of ourselves. When it came time to serve said pizzas I couldn't tell if I was being yelled at for ordering my food or being yelled at because there was so much. In a loud voice "okay
column6: well hand me plates and I'll hand you the pizza!"
